title: League Launcher not opening
body:
So I've recently deleted league, and now I'm trying to redownload it. 
For some weird reason, the launcher won't start up despite the logo popping up. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
Usually, it'll be like 'it stopped working' or 'trying to solve the problem'
And sometimes the logo will be on the screen and the yellow bar won't fill up ( the bar beneath the logo )
It's really annoying, I really like this game and enjoy it with my friends.
But its the tiny problems like these that makes me want to give up I swear .-. 
My internet connection is fine, I don't have any softwares for my computer that prevents it from opening.
Just the usual league launcher problems. 
Could I have someone help me with this problem quickly? 

Thanks!!

replies.body: It sounds like there might be a security setting blocking the patcher from launching.  I suggest using our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot this by restoring access to launch.  Don't give up!
hi it just happened to me ... did u fix your problem ??
